name: many-notes
description: Many Notes is a plain-text, Markdown-based note-taking platform with a focus on full control and simplicity. It allows organizing notes into folders with tags and supports self-hosted syncing and search.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Write notes in plain Markdown with syntax highlighting and preview

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Structure notes in a hierarchical folder system for logical grouping

features.title: Tag Support
features.description: Apply tags to notes for cross-folder organization and quick filtering

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search across all notes by content, title, or tags instantly

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Synchronize notes across devices using your own server or cloud storage

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Notes stored as plain text files for easy backup and portability
